content:
Posted: April 4
Early Access Review
								The game has a great cultural background very well implemented; it starts with the mechanics and reaches its visual and musical style.I liked the way everything is mixed, the variety of characters, the gameplay mechanics and the game's main goal.Of course, there's room for improvement and I've reached the developers about it. The good news is that they have plans to work on some of those improvements to give us all a better experience.If you enjoy games that have a cultural background as well as fighting games, I'd recomment it. NOTE: This game is ♥♥♥♥♥♥ hard to grasp, and even harder to master. So, if you're looking for a challenge, you're up for it.GOOD LUCK IN TRYING TO WIN YOUR FIRST MATCH PS: Hey devs, that should be a good achievement to implement, haha!

Early Access Review
								Fun fastpaced party game.The game is player-friendly and extremely fun. A creative way to mix basketball and dodgeballThe AI can be challenging even in a normal difficulty.Gameplay - 9Graphics - 9Music - 10Controls - 7 if you use a keyboard.Final Score  9/10

Early Access Review
								Fast paced basketball game of the gods, but be for warned mortals that the team of the gods are fast savage and hard. Take in the wonderful graphics, gameplay and fun sounds. Be ready to train as winning in this game takes loads of time and efforts. ;-)
